Summary: Clear night here. My 80 yo mother went to look at the sky. Saw a streak the size of a half dollar at 2 feet away, pale yellow glow, straight line from east to west overhead. She called me - a minute or two later it was gone.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carbondale
There were no other sightings in Carbondale on or around January 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsClear night here. My 80 yo mother went to look at the sky. Saw a streak the size of a half dollar at 2 feet away, pale yellow glow, straight line from east to west overhead. She called me - a minute or two later it was gone. Moved in a straight line as she watched. She did state that the light "looked like a flashlight" but the width was constant. This form is a car wreck.
